SELECT t.`templateId`,t.`templateName`,t.`templateContent`,t.`creationDate`,s.`theUserName` FROM `template` t,`staff` s WHERE t.`creater`=s.`roleId` AND t.`whetherDel` != 1
AND t.`templateName` LIKE CONCAT('%',#{tempName},'%')
AND s.`theUserName` LIKE CONCAT('%',#{username},'%')

SELECT t.templateId, th.hotelId, h1.hotelName, th.costPrice AS thcostPrice, th.offer AS thoffer FROM template t,templatehotel th,hotel h1 WHERE t.templateId=th.templateId AND th.hotelId=h1.hotelId AND t.templateId=#{templateId}
SELECT s.scenicSpotName,ts.costPrice,ts.offer FROM `templatescenicspot` ts, `scenicspot` s WHERE ts.scenicSpotId=s.scenicSpotId AND ts.templateId=#{templateId}

SELECT SUBSTRING(CONCAT(t.templateName),1,2) AS templateName FROM template t,hoteroomtype h,dispatch s WHERE t.templateId=h.templateId AND h.offerId=s.dispatchId AND s.dispatchId=#{dispatchId} AND weight=1
